usage_tags:
format: type number
combatgood, combatbad, logistics

used in determining autofit, higher numbers = more likely (inverse for combatbad)
military markets are far more likely to favor combat modification, non-military markets care less and can get logistics
sell_weight: if 0, is never sold in markets
combat_drop_chance: if 0, is never dropped in combat
